item.title: Fetuccini Al Limone
item.description: Fetuccini Al Limone This is a classic recipe Ingredients 500g Fetuccinne 1 tbsp Olive Oil 30g Butter 200ml Heavy Cream 100ml Milk Juice of two lemons Nutmeg 1 Onion Spring onion Lemon zest from your lemons Salt and Pepper to taste How to cook Cook pasta in salty as the sea water
